text: Johannes Jacobus Willebrordus (Joost) Zwagerman (18 November 1963 â€“ 8 September 2015) was a Dutch writer, poet, and essayist. Among his teachers was the novelist Oek de Jong. He was born in Alkmaar in the Netherlands. Zwagerman committed suicide in Haarlem, Netherlands, aged 51. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch essayists Category:Dutch poets Category:People from Alkmaar Category:Writers from North Holland Category:Writers who committed suicide Category:People with ankylosing spondylitis
title: Joost Zwagerman
